data.description: Blackberry and raspberry aromas show a typical Navarran whiff of green herbs and, in this case, horseradish. In the mouth, this is fairly full bodied, with tomatoey acidity. Spicy, herbal flavors complement dark plum fruit, while the finish is fresh but grabby.
data.title: Tandem 2011 Ars In Vitro Tempranillo-Merlot (Navarra)
